pageContext.claim: “My doctors have given more information than has been given on any human being in the history of the world.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump said this in response to a question about when he was last tested for covid-19 before he came down with the disease. Trump and the White House refused to release that information, presumably because the answer would show the White House had been lying about how often the president was tested. (He was supposed to be tested the day of the first presidential debate.) In general, the Trump White House has provided relatively sparse details about the president's health, including his bout with covid.
